translation: "In the name of the king of the dhāraṇīs, [A-ko+(ku/in)][A-ko+i](2) Vaiśravaṇa(2)[J-jao+ya]-chi-li-jñādhāra(8) Lame [this-word+jñān]-lo(9) Unphaṭṭu-so-waka(citation needed), the great mother mind truly says.

source_sentence: [阿-可+(俱/寸)][阿-可+梨]摩訶王心中心呪曰。
translation: [A-ko+(ku/inch)][A-ko+ri], the central mantra of King Mahākāla's mind, said.
"Om kadano un sowuha (citation).
"These are the three kinds of true words that are spoken.

source_sentence: 即時三千大千世界六種震動。
translation: Immediately, the 3,000 great one-thousand worlds shook in six ways.
The great sons then were greatly alarmed and said.
"What's the cause for this?
The king then said.
'My worldly mission is to transcend the world.'
'There's only one great cause and condition.'
